title: Integrated Library Service Design for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical knowledge and experience in utilizing online learning tools
context.additional_context: Design of a mathematics learning process utilizing VR simulation in a smartphone-based limited technological environment. Integration of library information literacy elements to enhance practical applicability.

learning_goals: Teams design strategies for utilizing library digital resources suitable for online mathematics learning through team-based collaboration.
Learners complete mathematical problem-solving projects by applying information retrieval and analysis skills in simulation/VR environments.
Learners develop and apply assessment rubrics linked to library services to measure information literacy skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
